title: Looking for Diamond Player who knows about runes and masteries and item builds :)
body: I'm a gold 4 main and I'm trying too look for little things to improve on to benefit my play. But as I'm doing this, I realize that if my runes/masteries/items are incorrect, then my foundation is wrong and it is making it harder to define between me making a mistake, or me just having the wrong setup. Please add me if you feel you can explain not only what to do, but why to do it- thanks :)

replies.body:
why does it have to be dim?

anyone can know runes and item and mastery optimization....its not a skill that improves gameplay....

hell, a large number of streamers dont know all the items, even at diamond level.

also, its rare to lose purely on wrong set up.

contact me ingame if you are serious and not just some troll who ACTUALLY thinks knowledge grows with skill.....

> [{quoted}](name=KingDinger,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=KbqdUl1l,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-17T12:25:26.305+0000)
>
> why does it have to be dim?
> 
> anyone can know runes and item and mastery optimization....its not a skill that improves gameplay....
> 
> hell, a large number of streamers dont know all the items, even at diamond level.
> 
> also, its rare to lose purely on wrong set up.
> 
> contact me ingame if you are serious and not just some troll who ACTUALLY thinks knowledge grows with skill.....

*tips fedora*

...thats kinda random.

considering you posted: focus on the basics don't care about runes and stuff at your MMR, you should be able to beat people solely with mechanics if you wanna be better.

which is exactly the same as what i wrote...just vague and pointless without saying you would help if OP had questions regardless of the fact that it will do literally nothing to improve his games by just changing runes and masteries.

> [{quoted}](name=BurstFire301,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=KbqdUl1l,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-01-17T07:00:54.504+0000)
>
> I'm a gold 4 main and I'm trying too look for little things to improve on to benefit my play. But as I'm doing this, I realize that if my runes/masteries/items are incorrect, then my foundation is wrong and it is making it harder to define between me making a mistake, or me just having the wrong setup. Please add me if you feel you can explain not only what to do, but why to do it- thanks :)

focus on the basics don't care about runes and stuff at your MMR, you should be able to beat people solely with mechanics if you wanna be better.
